title: The Blowfly menace
creator_credit: A. C. McKay BVSc and Australian Wool Corporation
brief_description: For farmers and graziers this study of the life-cycle of the green blowfly and other flies associated with blowfly strike in sheep, and demonstrations of various methods of control, should prove both useful and interesting.
creator_credit_for_label: A. C. McKay BVSc and Australian Wool Corporation
